0.3.name: wordpress/hungred-smart-quotes
0.3.description:
This is a small plugin that replace the smart quotes function in Wordpress that format/encode the code in Wordpress. Hence, most symbols will be formatted/encoded by Wordpress texturize function. Example, '&' (ampersand) becomes '&' '"' (double quote) becomes '"' ''' (single quote) becomes ''' '<' (less than) becomes '<' '>' (greater than) becomes '>'

The plugin will help solve the above problem and produce the result below,

Example, '&' (ampersand) becomes '&' '"' (double quote) becomes '"' ''' (single quote) becomes ''' '<' (less than) becomes '<' '>' (greater than) becomes '>'

A control panel is also provided in this plugin to add in special tag for your code or disable smart quote in Wordpress. This problem is due to external code format plugin that required special tag such as [php] in syntaxhigher evolved. Upon, activate, all existing article that was previously formatted will be d
